headline: Hyundai Motor America reports U.S. Sales of 67,511 for the month of June 2016, up slightly from year ago
description: Hyundai Motor Co <005380.KS> :Hyundai Motor America reports U.S. Sales of 67,511 for the month of June 2016, up slightly from year ago.

headline: BRIEF-Hyundai Motor says U.S. sedan competition intensifies in H2
description: Corrects first bullet point to H1, not H2.Hyundai Motor Co <005380.KS>: Says U.S. sales incentives for sedans jumped in H1 compared with previous year; sees U.S. sedan competition intensifying in the second half . Says expects S.Korean vehicle demand to fall slightly in the second half . Says it plans to maintain China sales momentum in H2 Further company coverage: [nL4N1AB024] (Reporting by Hyunjoo Jin) ((hyunjoo.jin@thomsonreuters.com;)) Keywords: (CORRECTED).

headline: Hyundai Motor says to consider green car tie-up with China's local firms
description: Oct 26 (Reuters) - Hyundai Motor Co <005380.KS> says::To step up monitoring of possible revisions of South Korea's  free-trade deal with the United States .To raise the number of its SUV models in China to 7 by 2020 from 4 .To consider "flexible" cooperation on green cars with China's local firms.

headline: Hyundai India Exec Says Co Will Launch Nine Products In Country By 2020
description: Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hyundai Motor India MD & CEO Y.K. Koo::HYUNDAI INDIA EXEC SAYS CO WILL LAUNCH NINE PRODUCTS IN INDIA BY 2020, INCLUDING FACELIFTS.

headline: Kia Motors says reflects $246 mln quality costs in Q3 earnings
description: Oct 26 (Reuters) - Kia Motors Corp <000270.KS>::Says it reflected quality costs of 280 billion won ($246 million) in Q3 earnings.Says additional costs on engine-related recalls unlikely.Says it will launch a new large SUV in U.S. next year .Says it is considering expanding sourcing of U.S.-made parts in response to the new North America free trade deal.Says it aims to start production at Indian car plant in Sept next year.

headline: Hyundai Motor Reports 2018 Global Sales Of 4.59 Million Vehicles

headline: Hyundai Motor Targets Operating Margin of over 4 Pct This Year
description: April 24 (Reuters) - Hyundai Motor Co <005380.KS> says ::TO START U.S. EXPORTS OF PALISADE SUV IN APRIL.EXPECTS TO EXCEED S.KOREAN SALES TARGET FOR THIS YEAR.TO TRY TO CONTINUE PROFIT IMPROVEMENTS THIS YEAR.AIMS TO ACHIEVE OPERATING MARGIN OF OVER 4 PERCENT THIS YEAR.TO SUSPEND CHINA'S FIRST FACTORY.SHIFT OUTPUT OF ELANTRA SEDAN FROM CHINA'S FIRST PLANT TO OTHER FACTORIES.TO START U.S. SALES OF PALISADE SUV IN Q3.IN TALKS WITH S.KOREAN UNION TO BOOST OUTPUT OF PALISADE SUV.AIMS TO TURN AROUND U.S. SALES, PROFITABILITY THIS YEAR.

headline: Iveco does not see further significant price hikes throughout 2023 - CEO
description: Feb 10 (Reuters) - Iveco Group <IVG.MI> Chief Executive Gerrit Marx tells analysts in post-results call::WE HAVE NOT FORESEEN ANY FURTHER PRICE INCREASES AT THIS STAGE.PRICING EXPECTED TO BE A BIT MORE DIFFICULT IN H2 IN LIGHT OF DECLINING ENERGY, COMMODITY COSTS.ICOMMON PURCHASING AS PART OF PARTNERSHIP WITH HYUNDAI IS UNDER PREPARATION.WE ARE NOT CONSIDERING A DIVIDEND ON 2022 RESULTS BUT WE SAID THERE IS A DIVIDEND POLICY FOR FOLLOWING YEARS.I DO NOT EXPECT FURTHER SIGNIFICANT PRICE INCREASES THROUGHOUT 2023 AS WE FACE DECLINE IN COMMODITY PRICES.Further company coverage: CNHI.MI. (Reporting by Milan newsroom).

headline: Iveco Sees 2028 Adj. Net Income At About EUR 0.9 Bln In New Strategic Plan
description: March 14 (Reuters) - Iveco Group NV <IVG.MI>::SEES BY 2028 ADJUSTED. EBIT MARGIN OF DEFENCE UNIT BETWEEN 12%-13%.SEES 2028 FCF FROM INDUSTRIAL ACTIVITIES AT ABOUT 0.9 BILLION.SEES 2028 NET REVENUES FROM INDUSTRIAL ACTIVITIES AT ABOUT EUR 19 BILLION.SEES 2028 ADJUSTED. EBIT MARGIN FROM INDUSTRIAL ACTIVITIES BETWEEN 7%-8%.SEES BY 2028 REVENUES OF DEFENCE UNIT BETWEEN EUR 1.2-1.3 BILLION.SEES 2028 ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS ABOVE EUR 3PER SHARE.TO EXTEND PARTNERSHIP WITH HYUNDAI MOTOR INTO HEAVY-DUTY TRUCKS TO INCLUDE BATTERY ELECTRIC TRUCKS, FUEL CELL ELECTRIC TRUCKS FOR EUROPEAN MARKETS.SEES 2028 ADJUSTED. NET INCOME AT ABOUT EUR 0.9 BILLION.ANNOUNCES NON-BINDING MOU WITH FORD OTOSAN TO DEVELOP JOINT CABIN STRUCTURE FOR HEAVY-DUTY TRUCKS.Further company coverage: IVG.MI. (Reporting by Gdansk Newsroom). ((gdansk.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com; +48587720920;)).

headline: Hyundai Motor To Add Equipment To Build Hybrid Cars At Its U.S. EV Factory In Georgia

headline: Aptiv Sees Full Year 2024 Net Sales At $20,850 Mln-$21,450 Mln
description: May 2 (Reuters) - Aptiv PLC <APTV.N>::APTIV PLC - SEES FULL YEAR 2024 NET SALES $20,850 MILLION - $21,450 MILLION.APTIV PLC - SEES FULL YEAR 2024 ADJUSTED EBITDA $3,150 MILLION - $3,300 MILLION.APTIV PLC - SEES FULL YEAR 2024 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $1,000 MILLION.APTIV PLC - IN APRIL, APTIV AND HYUNDAI ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT TO RESTRUCTURE APTIV'S OWNERSHIP INTEREST IN MOTIONAL.APTIV PLC - HYUNDAI TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL FUNDING TO MOTIONAL.APTIV PLC - SEES FULL YEAR 2024 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER SHARE $5.80 - $6.30.APTIV PLC - DEAL WILL ELIMINATE ANY REQUIREMENTS FOR ADDITIONAL FUTURE FUNDING FOR MOTIONAL FROM APTIV.APTIV PLC - TRANSACTIONS ANTICIPATED TO RESULT IN A CUT IN APTIV'S COMMON EQUITY INTEREST FROM 50% TO APPROXIMATELY 15% IN MOTIONAL.APTIV PLC - REVISED FULL-YEAR OUTLOOK REFLECTS MORE CONSERVATIVE GROWTH FORECAST PRIMARILY DRIVEN BY REDUCED CUSTOMER SCHEDULES.

headline: Hyundai Motor Expects The U.S. Inflation Reduction Act Would Not Likely Be Scrapped Even If Trump Wins
description: July 25 (Reuters) - Hyundai Motor Co <005380.KS>::HYUNDAI MOTOR: EXPECTS THE U.S. INFLATION REDUCTION ACT WOULD NOT LIKELY BE SCRAPPED EVEN IF TRUMP WINS.HYUNDAI MOTOR: CONSIDERING PLANS TO BOOST SALES OF HYBRID CARS IN EFFORT TO PREPARE POSSIBLE SHRINKING OF THE IRA.HYUNDAI MOTOR: AIMS TO LIST ITS INDIA UNIT WITHIN THIS YEAR.HYUNDAI MOTOR: REVIEWS POSSIBILITY THAT BIDEN ADMINISTRATION WOULD EXECUTE IRA SUBSIDIES IN ANTICIPATION OF POTENTIAL TRUMP'S SECOND TERM.HYUNDAI MOTOR: PROFITABILITY OF HYBRID CARS STAND AT DOUBLE DIGIT.HYUNDAI MOTOR: PROFITABILITY LEVEL OF HYBRID CARS IS SIMILAR TO THAT OF INTERNAL  COMBUSTION ENGINE CARS.Further company coverage: 005380.KS. (Reporting by Heekyong Yang). ((Heekyong.Yang@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Hyundai Motor says closely monitoring Trump policy
description: Hyundai Motor Co <005380.KS> : Says watching closely policy of U.S. President Donald Trump . Says to use 30 percent to 50 percent of free cash flow for shareholder returns . Says to boost supply of Santa Fe, Tucson SUVs to U.S. market this year . Says aims to outperform China auto market this year . Says emerging market recovery to be limited this year . Says to pay year-end dividend of 3,000 won per common share . Further company coverage: [005380.KS] (Reporting by Hyunjoo Jin; Editing by Himani Sarkar) ((hyunjoo.jin@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Aramco And Hyundai Motor Group Collaborate On Advanced Fuels For Hybrid Electric Vehicles
description: March 29 (Reuters) - SAUDI ARABIAN OIL CO <2222.SE>::ARAMCO AND HYUNDAI MOTOR GROUP COLLABORATE ON ADVANCED FUELS FOR HYBRID ELECTRIC VEHICLES.HAVE AGREED TO JOINTLY RESEARCH AND DEVELOP AN ADVANCED FUEL FOR AN ULTRA LEAN-BURN, SPARK-IGNITION ENGINE THAT AIMS TO LOWER OVERALL CO2 EMISSIONS OF A VEHICLE.2-YEAR PARTNERSHIP SEEKS DEVELOPMENT OF AN OPTIMAL FUEL FORMULATION FOR USE IN COMBINATION WITH A NOVEL COMBUSTION SYSTEM COUPLED WITH AN ELECTRIFIED HYBRID VEHICLE.RESEARCH TEAM AIMS TO UNLEASH GREATER CO2 REDUCTION POTENTIALS BY DEPLOYING HYUNDAI MOTOR GROUP'S ULTRA-LEAN BURN COMBUSTION DESIGN IN A MODERN HYBRID VEHICLE.HYUNDAI MOTOR GROUP, WITH ITS AUTOMOTIVE AND TECHNOLOGY LEADERSHIP, WILL PROVIDE A STATE-OF--ART ULTRA-LEAN GASOLINE ENGINE FOR USE BY RESEARCH TEAM.TESTS WILL BE CONDUCTED BY RESEARCHERS IN CLEAN COMBUSTION RESEARCH CENTER (CCRC) AT KAUST.Further company coverage: 2222.SE. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).
